description: Dill Bill (2025) is a heartfelt Hindi romantic drama directed by Cchintan Shaah, now streaming exclusively on Ultraplay OTT. Starring Warina Hussain and Ishaan A. Khanna, the film explores love, identity, and the complexities of modern relationships. Originally scheduled for release in 2022, the film was postponed and finally launched on September 5, 2025
title: Dill Bill is Now Streaming Online: Know Everything About its Cast, Story, Release Date, and More

description: The James Webb Space Telescope has detected carbon-bearing molecules in a moon-forming disk surrounding CT Cha b, a massive planet-like object orbiting a young star 625 light-years away. The discovery marks the first measurement of its kind and offers clues to how moons like those around Jupiter and Saturn might have formed.
title: James Webb Offers First Glimpse Into How Moons Are Built Around Distant Planets

description: New JWST observations reveal the hidden star-forming activity inside Sagittarius B2, the Milky Way’s largest molecular cloud. By seeing through dense dust, astronomers can study how stars form efficiently in extreme environments. These findings help explain not only Sgr B2 but also broader mechanisms shaping galaxies.
title: James Webb Telescope Unveils Hidden Star-Forming Regions in Sagittarius B2

description: Astronomers using JWST have delivered the first weather report of SIMP-0136, a rogue brown dwarf about 20 light-years away. The study revealed stable silicate clouds, auroras heating the upper atmosphere, and possible giant storm systems. Findings mark a breakthrough in studying alien weather and pave the way for mapping exoplanet climates.
title: JWST Delivers First-Ever Weather Report of Rogue Brown Dwarf World Glowing With Auroras

description: Little Hearts is a 2025 Telugu romantic comedy directed by Sai Marthand. Starring Mouli Tanuj Prasanth and Shivani Nagaram, the film blends youthful charm, romance, and humor. Released theatrically in September, it continues to draw attention for its relatable story, performances, and vibrant presentation.
title: Little Hearts (2025) Telugu OTT Release: What You Need to Know about its Cast, Plot, Trailer, and More

description: Million Dollar Listing: India Season 2 has now landed on your digital screens. The show will follow real estate agents on a quest to close the deal of their lives.
title: Million Dollar Listing: India Season 2 Streaming Now on OTT: Know When and Where to Watch it Online.

description: The Orionid meteor shower 2025 will put on a breathtaking show this October, with shooting stars streaking across the sky. Caused by Halley’s Comet debris, the event peaks on October 21–22 and rewards viewers with clear, dark skies and patience. A must-watch for astronomy lovers and casual stargazers alike.
title: Orionid Meteor Shower 2025: When and How to Watch Stunning Shooting Stars

description: Directed by Robbie Grewal, Made In India: A Titan Story is an upcoming web series that will explore the journey of India’s best watch brand - Titan, from its evolution to rise.
title: Made In India: A Titan Story OTT Release Date: Know When and Where to Watch it Online

description: Smartphones like iPhone 15, OnePlus 13s are listed with price cuts in the ongoing Amazon Great Indian Festival Sale 2025. The sale promises up to 80 percent off on mobiles and accessories. SBI credit card users can get extra discounts. Further, there are exchange deals, no-cost EMI options, and Amazon Pay offers.
title: Amazon Sale 2025: Best Deals on Smartphones Under Rs. 50,000 During the Great Indian Festival Sale

description: Amazon Great Indian Festival Sale 2025 saw its “strongest-ever start”, marking visits from over 38 crore Indians in the first two days of the sale, the company recently announced. The sale event is still live, and the deals could be available till the third week of October. During the ongoing Amazon sale, you can grab several PC and laptop peripherals like wireless and wired mice, microphones, keyboards, Bluetooth speakers, and storage devices at discounted prices.
title: Amazon Sale 2025: The Ultimate Deals on Wireless Mice From Logitech, HP, Dell and More Brands

description: Halo Studios has confirmed a "deep dive" panel on Halo projects currently in development. The panel will take place at Halo World Championship 2025 on October 24. Halo Studios have multiple Halo games in development in Epic Games' Unreal Engine 5. One of them is believed to be a remake of the first game in the series, Halo: Combat Evolved.
title: Halo Studios to Host a "Deep Dive" on Halo Games in Development This Month

description: Northrop Grumman’s Cygnus XL, the largest cargo spacecraft ever built by the company, successfully docked at the International Space Station. Launched on a Falcon 9 rocket from Cape Canaveral, it delivered over 11,000 pounds of supplies and research materials.
title: Cygnus XL Successfully Docks at International Space Station on First Mission

description: If buying your first action camera or upgrading your older model is on your wishlist, then our latest article, comprising the best deals on action cameras under Rs. 20,000, will come to your aid. These devices are usually an expensive purchase at their retail price. However, the Amazon sale is a great avenue for purchasing an action camera, enabling you to capture high-quality video and photos hands-free during your high-speed activities and adventures.
title: Amazon Sale 2025: Best Deals on Action Cameras Under Rs. 20,000

description: Samsung Q8F QLED Smart TV series is one of the most popular series in 2025. The Smart TV from the brand brings a host of interesting features and specifications that makes it a perfect option to buy this festive session. Here's everything you need to know about the latest QLED Smart TV from Samsung.
title: Hands-On with Samsung QLED Q8F 4K Smart TV: This is the AI-Powered TV to Beat in 2025

description: iQOO 15 is scheduled to debut soon globally, including in India. Ahead of its official launch, the company has been revealing the specifications of the handset, hinting at what the phone might offer. The Vivo sub-brand has already confirmed that the phone will carry a telephoto sensor on the back. Now, an iQOO executive has revealed that the phone will also support wireless charging. Moreover, the pricing of the handset in India has surfaced online.
title: iQOO 15 Confirmed to Support Wireless Charging; Might Be More Expensive Than the iQOO 13 at Launch

description: Motorola Edge 70 5G could launch soon. Ahead of the formal reveal, the pricing, colour options of the phone have been leaked on the Web.  It could come with 12GB of RAM and 512GB of storage. The Motorola Edge 70 5G is expected to arrive as a global variant of Moto X70 Air. It is said to be available in Pantone Bronze Green, Pantone Gadget Gray and Pantone Lily Pad shades.
title: Motorola Edge 70 5G Price Leaked Ahead of Launch; Could Arrive in Three Colourways

description: Tata Communications has partnered with BSNL to enable the nationwide launch of eSIM services for mobile users across India. The eSIMs will be powered by Tata Communications’ Move platform. This allow users to activate connectivity remotely without a physical SIM. The delivery of eSIMs will take place through Tata Communications Collaboration Services Private Ltd. (TCCSPL).
title: Tata Communications Partners BSNL to Offer eSIM Services Across India

description: Turkey is drafting anti-money laundering regulations to give the country’s financial crime regulator (or MASAK) the power to freeze and restrict cryptocurrency accounts. The rules will require exchanges to collect user details, delay withdrawals under certain conditions, and cap stablecoin transfers. Platforms following the Travel Rule may offer higher limits. The regulations follow prior licensing requirements and are part of wider efforts to strengthen oversight while considering a small transaction tax.
title: Turkey Said to Consider Granting Authorities Power to Freeze Crypto Accounts Under New AML Rules

description: Amazon Great Indian Festival Sale 2025 has entered its second week after starting on September 23. The e-commerce giant’s biggest annual event brings discounts across smartphones, laptops, tablets, smartwatches, smart TVs, and more. Shoppers planning to switch from traditional smart TVs to portable projectors can find lucrative offers on models from Lumio, Portronics, Zebronics, Wzatco, and others.
title: Amazon Sale 2025: Best Deals on Portable Projectors Under Rs. 30,000

description: Asus refreshed its ROG Zephyrus line of gaming laptops with the latest Nvidia RTX 50 series GPUs this year. But we tested out last year's ROG Zephyrus G16 with AMD Ryzen AI 9 HX 370 and Nvidia GeForce RTX 4070 to see if it still holds up.
title: Asus ROG Zephyrus G16 (2024) Long Term Review: Does It Hold Up in 2025?

description: Samsung could introduce the Galaxy S26+ as part of its flagship lineup next year, as per a report. Previously, the tech giant was reported to have decided to replace the Plus model with the Galaxy S26 Edge. However, the current Galaxy S25 Edge has seen low sales, due to which Samsung is reviving the Galaxy S26+ project. This potentially means that the Galaxy S26 lineup could now include four models.
title: Samsung Galaxy S26+ Launch Back on Track Due to Poor Sales of Galaxy S25 Edge: Report

description: Samsung Galaxy S26 series, which could include the Galaxy S26 Pro, Galaxy S26 Ultra, and Galaxy S26 Edge, is expected to launch globally next year. The Pro model is said to succeed this year’s standard Galaxy S25. Earlier expected to be powered by a Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chip, a report now reveals that one of the phones in the rumoured Galaxy S26 lineup could be powered by Samsung’s Exynos 2600 chipset, built on a 2nm process. The SoC is said to have entered mass production.
title: Samsung Galaxy S26 Series Will Reportedly Feature 2nm Exynos 2600 SoC; Tipster Leaks Camera Specifications

description: Amazon Great Indian Festival Sale 2025 is still live, making it a good time to buy a window air conditioner ahead of next summer. Shoppers can find discounts on one-ton and 1.5-ton models from brands like Voltas, Llyod, Hitachi, and Blue Star. The sale also includes additional benefits such as bank offers and no-cost EMI options.
title: Amazon Sale 2025: Best Deals on Window ACs From Voltas, Hitachi and More

description: The crypto market steadied on October 1, with Bitcoin holding above $114,000 and Ethereum near $4,140. Analysts said October, often called ‘Uptober’, could provide bullish momentum, though macro risks like the US government shutdown and RBI policy remain in focus. Altcoins, including Solana, Binance Coin, and Dogecoin, showed mixed moves.
title: Bitcoin Holds Firm as Crypto Traders Look to Seasonal ‘Uptober’ Rally

description: Nothing OS 4.0 Open Beta is available for eligible devices. The beta update brings key new features such as the AI Usage Dashboard and support for Essential Apps. The update also includes general improvements, such as a new pop-up view with two floating icons, two new lock screen clock faces, and support for 2 x 2 tiles in Quick Settings. Testers can download it to their Nothing Phone 3, Phone 2, Phone 2a, and Phone 2a Plus smartphones.
title: Nothing OS 4.0 Open Beta Released With AI Usage Dashboard, Essential Apps: Check Eligible Models, How to Register

description: Samsung's tri-folding smartphone is expected to launch before the end of this year. We have seen plenty of leaks about the possible launch date of the much-awaited tri-fold smartphone. Now, a new report suggests that the launch will take during the upcoming Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC) summit. It could feature a 9.96-inch display in the fully unfolded form.
title: Samsung Galaxy Z TriFold to Launch at APEC Summit in Late October: Report

description: Vivo V60e launch date has been announced. The phone will debut in the second week of October. It is confirmed to pack a 6,500mAh battery. The upcoming handset will feature a 200-megapixel primary camera with Optical Image Stabilisation (OIS). It will also debut with an India-exclusive photography feature dubbed AI Festival Portrait.
title: Vivo V60e India Launch Date Announced: Check Expected Price, Specifications

description: Amazon  Fire TV Stick 4K Select, Echo Dot Max, Echo Studio, and other new smart home devices, along with new smart TVs, were unveiled on Tuesday at the company's hardware launch event. Currently available for pre-order, most of the devices will start shipping next, while others will go on sale later this year. During the event, the US-based tech giant also announced that its new Echo-series devices will come with Alexa+ out of the box, which was first unveiled in February 2025, as an upgraded version of its voice assistant.
title: Amazon Event Roundup: Amazon Launches Fire TV Stick 4K Select, Omni QLED Series, New Kindle Scribe and Echo Devices

description: Amazon Great Indian Festival Sale 2025 entered its eighth day on Wednesday, offering festive discounts across multiple categories, including smartphones, tablets, smartwatches, gaming consoles, laptops, and more. Shoppers looking for a new 55-inch smart TV can find attractive deals on models from brands like Sony, Samsung, Xiaomi, and LG. The annual sale continues to bring lucrative offers across home appliances and electronics.
title: Amazon Sale 2025: Best Deals on 55-inch Smart TVs Under Rs. 35,000

description: Google has announced a new feature for AI Mode which adds visual exploration capabilities. It enables users to search for and find something soecific that they cannot express in words. As per the company, they can further fine-tune the search results with prompts or ask follow-up questions about what’s on their screen. The new feature is rolling out in the English language for users in the users this week.
title: Google’s AI Mode Updated With Ability to Show AI-Generated Visual Results

description: Powerbeats Fit true wireless stereo (TWS) earbuds have been launched in India on Tuesday. The latest offering from Apple's audio brand Beats runs on Apple’s H1 chip and offer ANC (active noise canceling) feature. The fitness focused earbuds have an IPX4 rating for water resistance. The earbuds offer features like Transparency mode, Adaptive EQ and Personalised Spatial Audio with Dolby Atmos support. The Powerbeats Fit are claimed to deliver up to 30 hours of battery life on a single charge, along with the charging case.
title: Powerbeats Fit Launched in India With IPX4 Rating, Up to 30 Hours Total Playback Time

description: The Realme 15 Pro 5G Game of Thrones Limited Edition will be launched in India and the global markets on October 8. The handset is teased to have cosmetic changes compared to the standard variant, such as black and gold styling. There will be custom Ice and Fire UI themes, inspired by the show Game of Thrones. The Realme 15 Pro 5G limited edition will have similar features and specifications to the standard variant.
title: Realme 15 Pro 5G Game of Thrones Edition India Launch Date Announced: Expected Specifications, Features

description: Realme 15x 5G has been launched in India, the company announced on Wednesday. The new smartphone is powered by a MediaTek Dimensity chip, coupled with an ARM Mali GPU and a 7,000mAh battery. The budget handset is currently on sale in the country via e-commerce platforms. It is offered in three colour options and storage variants.
title: Realme 15x 5G Launched in India With 7,000mAh Battery, 50-Megapixel Cameras: Price, Specifications

description: Apple is expected to unveil a new iPad Pro with M5 chipset early next year. recent rumours suggested that it will enter mass production soon.  In a fresh update, an unboxing video of the unannounced M5 iPad Pro has surfaced on the Web that gives a hands-on look at the design, as well as specifications. In the video, the new model appears to be similar to the M4 model in terms of design. It features the same aluminum chassis with a single camera on the back.
title: Apple's iPad Pro With M5 Chip Spotted in Unboxing Video; Design, Specifications Leaked

description: Nothing has announced Essential, it's vibe coding suite aimed at AI-centric devices. It allows users to generate their own Essential apps using natural language commands. These can be shared on Playground, a new community-driven hub. The existing Essential Space app has also been further enhanced with the introduction of Essential Memory.
title: Nothing Launches Essential AI Suite for Creating Personalised Apps; First Step Towards AI-Native OS, Says Carl Pei

description: OpenAI has announced the Sora 2 video generation model, nearly a year after the first version’s debut. The new AI-powered tool will be accessible for free through an invite-only iOS app, designed in a TikTok-style format. Users can create AI videos of themselves, share them with friends, or use the “Cameo” feature to generate videos of others.
title: OpenAI Introduces Sora 2 Video Generation AI Model, Launches New TikTok-Like Social App

description: Amazon has unveiled the latest Kindle Scribe lineup at its 2025 fall hardware event, introducing the first colour display model, Kindle Scribe Colorsoft. The new e-reader features a quad-core chipset and a redesigned front light system with miniaturised LEDs. While announced this week, the third-generation devices will only go on sale later this year.
title: Colour Finally Comes to Kindle Scribe: Meet Amazon's 2025 E-Reader With a Vibrant New Display

description: The leaked computer-aided design (CAD) renders of the purported Samsung Galaxy S26 Pro and the Galaxy S26 Edge surfaced earlier this month, and now it appears to be the turn for the Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra. As per a report, the anticipated successor to the Galaxy S25 Ultra could witness two design changes, one affecting the rear camera module, while the other makes it more ergonomic.
title: Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra CAD Renders Reveal Rounder Edges, Hybrid Camera Module: Report

description: The Samsung Galaxy Watch 8 offers a premium design language and a large 1.47-inch Super AMOLED display. The silicone straps that come with the smartwatch provide a comfortable experience. It also comes loaded with some interesting health features, including an AI Running Coach, Antioxidant Index, Advanced Sleep Tracking and Coaching, Stress Management, AI-powered energy score, and more. The smartwatch features a powerful processor and runs on the latest Wear OS 6, with One UI on top. Check out the review to know more about the latest Samsung Galaxy Watch 8.
title: Samsung Galaxy Watch 8 Review: The No-Nonsense Smartwatch

description: It might be prudent to wait a little if you’re considering a new smartphone purchase, with numerous launches expected this month. Here’s our list of the Upcoming Smartphones in October 2025 to provide you with a better idea of what’s coming soon and help you make an informed buying decision.
title: Upcoming Smartphones in October 2025: OnePlus 15, Xiaomi 17, Vivo V60e, and More
